title: Battery Life
content:
I have the Google Pixel 4XL.
It has started to only charge up to 50% and will shut off intermittently.
When I plug the charger in it also comes up with a "?" on the battery symbol.
Now it doesn't tell me how much percentage of battery I have at all, just the battery symbol.
When I go to the battery settings it just tells me "Unknown".
How do I fix this? Can it be fixed with out being sent off to be repaired?
